price: Asomafoͻ (yi de) anigyesɛm, ne kɔkɔbɔ (brɛɛ amanfoͻ) sεdeε Asomafoͻ no (mmaeε no) akyi adasamma nnya nyinasoͻ bi nntia Nyankopͻn. Onyankopͻn ne Otumfoͻ a Otumi ade nyinaa yε, Ɔne Onyansafoͻ.
arabic: رُّسُلٗا مُّبَشِّرِينَ وَمُنذِرِينَ لِئَلَّا يَكُونَ لِلنَّاسِ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ حُجَّةُۢ بَعۡدَ ٱلرُّسُلِۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ عَزِيزًا حَكِيمٗا

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: rusulan mubashirīna wamundhirīna li-allā yakūna lilnnāsi ʿalā al-lahi ḥujjatun baʿda al-rusuli wakāna al-lahu ʿazīzan ḥakīman
